summary: I basically just stripped the enchantments off the Nightingale Armor so they could be enchanted with whatever you like. I did this because the standard enchantments are kinda weak. The Muffle Enchantment on the boots remains because it is a unique enchantment which you can\'t bestow yourself.
descriptionHtml:
I basically just stripped the enchantments off the Nightingale Armor so they could be enchanted with whatever you like. I did this because the standard enchantments are kinda weak. The Muffle Enchantment on the boots is a unique \"Nightingale Stride\" enchantment so I have a version where the boots have not been stripped because it is a unique enchantment which you can\'t bestow yourself (whether or not it is better than standard Muffle enchantment remains to be seen). If you wish for the entire set to be bland, including the boots, download the file labeled \"full\".

NOTE: You can disenchant the boots with this mod but you currently cannot add the \"Nightingale Stride\" enchantment back to any item. So don\'t bother disenchanting them.

Installation: Choose your file, Extract rar file directly into your Skyrim/Data folder and then make sure it is checked in the \"Data\" section of the launcher (though it usually does this by default).
author: BeastGevaudan
